      • isNodeDomainCorrect

        public static boolean isNodeDomainCorrect(Node node,
                          int webSize)
        Tests a node's domain and prints out descriptive error messages.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to be tested for validity.
        webSize - The size of the web the node is in.
        Returns:
        True if the node's domain is correct; false otherwise.

      • testFindInsertionPoint

        public void testFindInsertionPoint()
        Randomly creates a HyPeerWeb of size between 101 and 200, inclusive. Then finds the insertion point by randomly selecting a node and calling findInsertionPoint.

      • testFindDeletionPoint

        public void testFindDeletionPoint()
        Randomly creates a HyPeerWeb of size between 101 and 2000, inclusive. Then tests the findDeletionPoint from all the nodes within the web.

      • testAddToHyPeerWeb
